about_the_game:
"in Wonderland" is a game about the adventures of a student trapped in a dreamlike world where you can play solo.
In this fantasy world, you will solve mysteries, overcome stages and find your way back to reality.
Through this adventure, our hope is for you to heal the wounds you've suffered in the real world and regain your innocence and courage.

Simple Controls But Challenging Objectives

Puzzles that entertain you without interrupting your relaxation.

Light and Fairytale-like Atmosphere

The simple, flat visual design will stimulate your imagination and bring you inner peace.
Admire the cherry blossom trees on the floating island and cute snacks in the kitchen.

Various Stages Filled With Mysteries

Everything holds meaning. Discover the story behind each area while enjoying the beautiful scenery.

name: In Wonderland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel ro AMD Six-core 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows10/11
  • Processor: Intel ro AMD Six-core 2.50GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: InWonderland is a healing casual puzzle game. Enjoy it leisurely.
